author: gartung
body:
Resubmit of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/20667 which was closed because I force-pushed the branch in a effort to roll back a change. I took the opportunity to do a merge --squash.

A cms.Sequence can be converted to a cms.Task as long as the objects it contains are modules. The cms.Task is then passed to a cms.Sequence of the same name as the original. Doing this conversion allows ConvertToUnscheduled to work more efficiently.
title: cms.Sequence->cms.Task conversion for reconstruction
